title: "Just don't cheat and you won't get banned!"
body:
Transfered to LAN

Streamed me hitting D3 in like a day

People never got better, everybody played like Gold

Got perma banned for elo boosting, which I was not doing, didn't care LAN sucked

Got banned for 4 other things 2 months later on same account

?? ??

Contact LAN support

"Your account was personally audited we must transfer your ticket"

A week later Wookie answers my LAN ticket

"You were banned for multiple severe infractions on your account"

Support ticket closed, account's stats wiped

4 months later, I get an email for another perma ban on that account




-------------

Ya ok GD
